briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Tenoten for Children in the Treatment of Specific Developmental Disorders of Scholastic Skills in Children
officialTitle: Multicenter Double-blind Placebo-Controlled Randomized Clinical Trial of Efficacy and Safety of Tenoten for Children in the Treatment of Specific Developmental Disorders of Scholastic Skills in Children
conditions: Specific Developmental Disorders of Scholastic Skills
summary:
Purpose of the study:

â€¢ To evaluate efficacy and safety of Tenoten for children in the treatment of specific developmental disorders of scholastic skills in children.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Total Scholastic Skills Score (a Sum of Three Scales: Reading, Spelling, and Counting).
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: On Day 1 and after 12 weeks of the therapy
